# !f for declaring a figure name. One should ALWAYS follow the sequence '!f -> \n -> !< -> \n -> />'.
# Also, the figure between '!<' and '/>' should always have each line with the same width.
# The '.' fits that purpose.

!f NLGS_NORMAL

!<
      .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .
      .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .
      .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #000000 #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .
      .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #000000 #000000 #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #000000 #000000 #e8d09b #e8d09b #30302d #30302d #000000 #000000 #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .

/>

!f NLGS_DEAD

!<
      .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .

!f NLGS_HAPPY

      .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #cf0e42 #cf0e42 #cf0e42 #cf0e42 #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .

      .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #e8d09b #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #e8d09b #e8d09b #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #e8d09b #e8d09b #30302d #30302d #30302d #30302d #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .
      .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .
/>

!f NLGS_NORMAL_MUTE

!<
      .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .

!f NLGS_DEAD_MUTE

!f NLGS_HAPPY_MUTE

!<
      .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .    #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f #d6d00f    .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .       .
